channel.title: science on Henri Kauhanen
channel.description: Recent content in science on Henri Kauhanen

item.title: Agent-based modelling course
item.description: In summer semester 2024, I lectured Agent-based modelling at the University of Konstanz. The course contents, here, may be useful to some!

item.title: Language Dynamics Journal Club
item.description: Archive of papers read in a (very) approximately fortnightly reading group devoted to the study of language variation and change from an interdisciplinary perspective. Archive 11/03/2021 McElreath, R. (2020) The Golem of Prague. In Statistical rethinking: a Bayesian course with examples in R and Stan (2nd ed.), 1–18. Boca Raton, FL: CRC Press. 18/02/2021 Daniels, D., Barth, D. & Barth, W. (2019) Subgrouping the Sogeram languages: a critical appraisal of Historical Glottometry.
